p: This synthesis is controlled by the activity of Δ5-desaturase and Δ6-desaturase enzymes, which are often compromised during inflammatory conditions and diseases. It has been found that diets enriched in ω-3 fatty acids are able to activate the conversion of DGLA into PG1, whereas low ω-3 intake induces the conversion in AA with the synthesis of proinflammatory prostanoids [ 178].
